name: letra-a-letra
description: A fast-paced multiplayer game blending word search and battleship, where players race to find letters while sabotaging their opponents.

scripts.prestart: npm install && npm install --prefix api && npm install --prefix ui && node -e "require('clear')()"
scripts.start: concurrently -n SERVER,UI -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix api" "npm run dev --prefix ui"
